author: VVLSV
title: Vegan friendly hotel
text:
The staff were very friendly and polite at check in. We had a lovely clean room and the location is right next to Borough Market and less than 5 minutes walk from London Bridge tube so it's an excellent location.
The breakfast was a self service buffet with hot and cold selections and we were easily able to find several vegan friendly options.
This is the first time I'd stayed here and would definitely recommend it.
We were able to leave our luggage safely the following day, free of charge, which we really appreciated.
Thank you
